title: Tricks and Techniques of Logo Design
headline: This free online course analyzes steps involved in the logo design process, working with photoshop, and finding clients.
description: Tricks and Techniques of Logo Design is a free online course that teaches powerful tips for effective logo design. Discover some advanced typography techniques. In this course, you will learn how to clean up your design using photoshop. Different techniques of automatically converting raster pixel images into vector shapes objects will be discussed. Learn the tricks to finding your clients and how much you should charge. Start this course today!

courseDescription:
Who are the businesses that fail to survive and who are the ones that taste success? Many entrepreneurs who have made extra attempts to create a strong visual brand identity in the market have become successful. So, making good visual communication with people is necessary to run a successful business. This is the reason that modern entrepreneurs pay so much emphasis on creating unique visuals. Tricks and Techniques of Logo Design is a free online course that teaches powerful tips for effective logo design. It analyzes six steps involved in the logo design process. You will learn how to gather information from your clients, the right questions to ask your logo design clients, and how to brainstorm ideas. This course evaluates some graphics fundamentals. The difference between Raster graphics and Vector graphics will be discussed.

In this course, you will learn about grouping/ungrouping, locking/unlocking, stacking, and duplicating objects. It analyzes how to work with colors inside an illustrator when designing your logo. The elements of design are the fundamental aspects of any visual design which include shape, color, space, form, line, value, and texture. This course teaches you how to build colour schemes and palettes. You will learn about resolutions and resizing when designing a logo with photoshop. This course introduces you to different effects and ideas when designing your logo. How to export the final version of your logo both from illustrator and photoshop to other formats will be discussed in this course. You will be taught how to manually trace pixels to create vector shapes. This course will introduce you to photoshop layers and how they function. In this course, you will understand how to create variations on your logo.

Finally, a logo is an essential part of doing business in the market where many competitors seek the attention of the customers. A logo becomes an effective marketing tool to take a companyâ€™s products and services to the people and targeted customers. But such advantages are accessible only when a logo design is professional. This course gives you hands-on knowledge on how to clean up your design using photoshop. It outlines the different ways of automatically converting the raster pixel images into vector shapes objects. You will learn about paths and anchor points. You will discover some logo inspiration sites, logo resource sites, and logo blogs. This course will lead you to the criteria of marketing your skills, the range with which you should charge your client as a beginner. This course will teach you how to properly align and space objects when using illustrator. This course will be of immense benefit to business owners, graphic designers, freelancers, brand influencers, and digital promoters. Register for this course Today!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.description: This module introduces six steps involved in the logo design process. Learn how to gather information from your clients, the right questions to ask your logo design clients, and how to brainstorm ideas. This module evaluates some graphics fundamentals. You will learn how to move your ideas to the computer and some of the intricacies of logo design.
topics: Introduction to Logo Design Process - Learning Outcomes
Introduction to Logo Design Process - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to Adobe Illustrator. You will learn how to properly align and space objects when using illustrator to design your logo. This module teaches you how to build colour schemes and palettes. You will learn some advanced typography techniques. This module teaches you how to handle and format text in photoshop.
topics: Techniques Involve Using Different Elements - Learning Outcomes
Techniques Involve Using Different Elements - Lesson Summary

modules.description: This module introduces how to clean up your design using photoshop. You will learn different ways of automatically converting the raster pixel images into vector shapes objects. It explains how to find your clients and how much you should charge. You will learn how to attain and maintain your target audience.
